amendment.description: Amendment allocates an additional $19.111 million for the Advanced Research Project Agency-Energy (ARPA-E).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Advanced Research Project Agency - Energy by $19,111,000 and reduce Departmental Administration, Department of Energy by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Schiff.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
